summary_gpt: The filing announces an upcoming earnings conference call for Punjab National Bank (PNB) to discuss its financial results for the quarter and year ended March 31, 2025, scheduled for May 7, 2025, with details provided for participation. It also includes contact information and registration details for analysts and investors to join the call.

The bank has scheduled a board meeting on May 7, 2025, to approve financial results for the quarter/year ending March 31, 2025, recommend dividends, and consider raising capital through Basel-III compliant bonds. The meeting also involves discussions on share trading window closure and compliance with SEBI regulations.

The filing announces a change in the Marginal Cost of Funds Based Lending Rate (MCLR) effective from May 1, 2025, with specific interest rate adjustments for various tenors, while maintaining the existing RLLR and Base Rate. It also provides contact details and emphasizes the bank's branding and stability.

The filing announces a change in key managerial personnel at PNB, with new appointments for the Company Secretary & Compliance Officer and the Board & Coordination Division, approved by the board on 30.04.2025. It details the profiles and experience of the new appointees.

The filing discloses the annual details of non-convertible securities issued by Punjab National Bank for FY 2024-25, including listing information, credit ratings, and regulatory compliance under SEBI regulations. It also reaffirms the bank's credit ratings as AA+ with a stable outlook from multiple credit rating agencies.
